# MailMuse

> MailMuse is an email marketing intelligence platform that tracks and analyzes email campaigns from 150+ top brands across 13 industries. Marketers use MailMuse to browse real email examples, analyze competitor strategies, and reuse campaigns as editable templates.

## Core Features
- Browse 7,000+ real marketing emails from top brands
- Analyze competitor email strategies: send frequency, subject lines, campaign types
- Use any email as a drag-and-drop editable template
- Track festive and seasonal campaign timelines
- Compare brands side-by-side

## Core Pages
- [Browse Emails](https://www.mailmuse.in/browse): Search and filter 7,000+ real marketing emails by brand, industry, or campaign type
- [Brand Directory](https://www.mailmuse.in/brands): Email strategy profiles for 150+ brands with send frequency, campaign breakdowns, and subject line analytics
- [Industry Categories](https://www.mailmuse.in/industry): Email campaigns organized by 13 industries including Fashion, Beauty, Food & Beverages, Electronics, and more
- [Email Types](https://www.mailmuse.in/types): Campaign examples by type â€” sale emails, welcome series, abandoned cart, newsletters, festive campaigns, product launches, and more
- [Campaign Calendar](https://www.mailmuse.in/campaigns): Festive and seasonal email campaign timelines across brands
- [Analytics](https://www.mailmuse.in/analytics): Email marketing analytics, benchmarks, and competitive intelligence
- [Pricing](https://www.mailmuse.in/pricing): Free forever plan with 10 email views/day, or Pro for unlimited access

## Blog / Insights
- [Blog](https://www.mailmuse.in/blog): Email marketing insights, strategy breakdowns, and data-driven reports
- [Subject Line Strategies](https://www.mailmuse.in/blog/subject-line-strategies): Data analysis of subject line patterns from 7,000+ emails
- [Welcome Email Best Practices](https://www.mailmuse.in/blog/welcome-email-best-practices): How to build welcome sequences that convert
- [Cart Abandonment Guide](https://www.mailmuse.in/blog/cart-abandonment-email-guide): Recovery strategies with real brand examples
- [Email Automation Guide](https://www.mailmuse.in/blog/email-automation-for-d2c): Essential automated email flows for brands

## Comparison Pages
- Compare any two brands' email strategies side-by-side at /compare/{brand-a-vs-brand-b}

## Optional
- [Full llms.txt specification](https://llmstxt.org/)
